inputs.prompt: Create a simple 3D version of this logo, it is colored white, slightly extruded, floating against a solid black background taken from a low left angle, giving it a heroic feel. Taken with a long focal length.
inputs.system_prompt:
You are an expert image-generation engine. You must ALWAYS produce an image.
Interpret all user input—regardless of format, intent, or abstraction—as literal visual directives for image composition.
If a prompt is conversational or lacks specific visual details, you must creatively invent a concrete visual scenario that depicts the concept.
Prioritize generating the visual representation above any text, formatting, or conversational requests.

inputs.prompt:
STEP 1: ANALYZE BOTH FRAMES

For each image, identify:

Visual Elements:
Form (shape, 3D, position)
Texture (surface details, patterns)
Color (hues, contrast, temperature)
Background (environment, depth)
Lighting (source, quality, direction, mood)
Perspective (angle, focal point)
Mood (tone, energy, aesthetic)

Transition Strategy:
Transition order always goes from image 1 to image 2.
Shared elements connecting both frames
Challenges (dimension shifts, style changes)
Opportunities (natural bridges between frames)


STEP 2: BUILD THE PROMPT (≤50 WORDS)
Structure:
[Subject + Action] → [Beginning → Middle → End]  +  [MODIFIERS]

Rules:
A. Lead with concrete subject + action verb
The transitions must have a lot of dynamic action.
Use specific nouns and active verbs
Avoid vague or passive language

B. Map the journey in 3 beats
Describe HOW things transform, not just THAT they do
Start state → transition → end state

C. Use dynamic cinematic motion verbs
Good: dissolves, spirals, cascades, erupts, morphs, fragments, reconverges
Avoid: changes, moves, transforms (alone)


D. State spatial transformations
Dimension changes: "flat to volumetric", "2D to 3D"
Scale shifts: "zooms into detail", "pulls back to reveal"

E. Define visual style
Colors: literal names (teal, vermilion, neon green)
Lighting: volumetric, rim-lit, soft diffusion, bloom
Texture: grain, scratches, chromatic aberration
FPS: "slow-motion", "cinematic 24fps", "digital rain FPS"

F. Add 1-3 bracketed modifiers
Format: [DESCRIPTOR IN CAPS]
Examples: [DYNAMIC CAMERA PUSH], [VOLUMETRIC GLOW], [SLOW MOTION], [FAST PACED ENERGY]


STEP 3: OUTPUT
ONLY output the completed transition prompt. Nothing else.

Do NOT include:

Process explanations
Structural breakdowns
Analysis notes
Follow-up questions
Generate this logo made out of glowing green ASCII code, maintain the depth and composition of the logo while adding the desired texture element
Generate this image 5 seconds into the future after much dynamic action, maintain the overall shape of the textured logo
